alert.note: Alert for Beaverhead, Lemhi Highlands; Centennial Mountains, Island Park; Challis, Pahsimeroi Valleys; Lost River Range; Lost River Valleys (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued January 12 at 11:55AM MST until January 13 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 8 AM MST SATURDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 40 below zero. * WHERE...Lost River Valley/Range and Challis/Pahsimeroi Valleys, including but not limited to Island Park, Kilgore, Dubois, Spencer, Small, Howe, Arco, Mackay, Chilly, Borah Peak, and Challis. * WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 8 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.

area.areaDesc: Beaverhead, Lemhi Highlands; Centennial Mountains, Island Park; Challis, Pahsimeroi Valleys; Lost River Range; Lost River Valleys
